channel.title: DeltaScape Compiler
channel.description:
In the Delta Scape compiler it says:
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]
In my Java file there is no Javac.exe so I`m wondering is there a different compiler I can use or can I put a different directory to a different .exe program.

item.title: DeltaScape Compiler
item.dc:creator: @pktw1nz pktw1nz
item.description:
@pktw1nz wrote:

here use this works perfect with me

@echo off
title Comping…
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape Compiler

@360236 wrote:

In the Delta Scape compiler it says:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

In my Java file there is no Javac.exe so I`m wondering is there a different compiler I can use or can I put a different directory to a different .exe program.
